ibis.ipl

Class ConnectionFailedException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.io.IOException
          • ibis.ipl.IbisIOException
            • ibis.ipl.ConnectionFailedException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlreadyConnectedException, ConnectionRefusedException, ConnectionTimedOutException, PortMismatchException

    public class ConnectionFailedException
extends IbisIOException
    Container class for a single connection failure.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConnectionFailedException(java.lang.String detailMessage, IbisIdentifier ibisIdentifier, java.lang.String receivePortName)
      Constructs a ConnectionFailedException for a failed attempt to connect to a specific named receiveport at a specific ibis instance.
      ConnectionFailedException(java.lang.String detailMessage, IbisIdentifier ibisIdentifier, java.lang.String receivePortName, java.lang.Throwable cause)
      Constructs a ConnectionFailedException for a failed attempt to connect to a specific named receiveport at a specific ibis instance.
      ConnectionFailedException(java.lang.String detailMessage, ReceivePortIdentifier receivePortIdentifier)
      Constructs a ConnectionFailedException for a failed attempt to connect to a specific receiveport.
      ConnectionFailedException(java.lang.String detailMessage, ReceivePortIdentifier receivePortIdentifier, java.lang.Throwable cause)
      Constructs a ConnectionFailedException for a failed attempt to connect to a specific receiveport.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IbisIdentifier ibisIdentifier()
      Returns the ibis identifier of the ibis instance running the receive port that was the target of the failed connection attempt.
      ReceivePortIdentifier receivePortIdentifier()
      Returns the receiveport identifier of the failed connection attempt.
      java.lang.String receivePortName()
      Returns the name of the receive port that was the target of the failed connection attempt.

    • Method Detail

      • ibisIdentifier

        public IbisIdentifier ibisIdentifier()
        Returns the ibis identifier of the ibis instance running the receive port that was the target of the failed connection attempt.
        Returns:
        the ibis identifier.

      • receivePortIdentifier

        public ReceivePortIdentifier receivePortIdentifier()
        Returns the receiveport identifier of the failed connection attempt. If the connection attempt specified ibis identifiers and names, this call may return null.
        Returns:
        the receiveport identifier, or null.

      • receivePortName

        public java.lang.String receivePortName()
        Returns the name of the receive port that was the target of the failed connection attempt.
        Returns:
        the receivePortName.
